members.name: TextEncoder()
members.description: Returns a newly constructed TextEncoder that will generate a byte stream with utf-8 encoding.

members.name: TextEncoder.encoding
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the name of the encoder, that is a string describing the method the TextEncoder will use.

members.name: TextEncoder.encode()
members.description: Returns a Uint8Array containing utf-8 encoded text.

parameters.name: buffer
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the text to encode.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Is a TextEncodeOptions dictionary with the property:

parameters.name: stream
parameters.description: A Boolean flag indicating if the encoding can be done in chunks or not. It defaults to false.
